channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk’s loyal and trusted Tesla ‘fixer’ takes the fall for dismal EV sales
item.description: Omead Afshar, head of North America and Europe, was fired for failing to turn around the brand's flagging demand, according to media reports.

item.title: Cashing in on America’s chicken obsession, Raising Cane’s is spreading its wings with plans to roost in nearly 100 new locations this year
Lionel Messi’s ex-teammate bets on streaming soccer hybrid to compete with Netflix, YouTube for Gen Z in U.S.
item.description: Lionel Messi's former Barcelona teammate Gerard Piqué's streaming-focused football venture plans October launch in the U.S. as competition heats up wi...

item.title: A scientific breakthrough researchers call ‘magic’ could transform treatment for a leading cause of death
item.description: In the fight to improve stroke outcomes, a new weapon emerges.

item.title: Why despite all the AI upheaval, there’s never been a better time to be human
item.description: The AI revolution changes how we decide and act—elevating the value of uniquely human insight.
